ui.viralSub: Scan QR code to start test

guide.purpose: This test measures your 'social trust', analyzing your level of trust in others and society as a whole.
guide.instruction: Read each statement and select the option that best matches your usual thinking. Honest answers will provide a more accurate profile.
guide.interpretation: Results are shown as a social trust index. This shows how open and cooperative you are in relationships with others.

items.text: I believe that most people are fundamentally good-willed.
I can willingly help a stranger who asks for assistance.
I think most people only look after their own interests.
I show basic trust even to people I meet for the first time.
I must always be on guard because I can be easily deceived by others.
I believe trust among people is most important for a fair society.
I think competition is closer to human nature than cooperation.
I believe people around me will willingly help when I'm in difficulty.
I've been betrayed many times after trusting people, so I'm now cautious.
I think trusting others makes society better.

T.high: You have high trust in others and tend to view society positively overall. You form cooperative relationships well.
T.low: You have caution toward others and need time to build trust. Past experiences may have influenced your current trust level.
